snippet: After Euro 2012, which begins on Friday, Andriy Shevchenko, 35, an icon to millions of people in his native Ukraine, hopes to move to the United States to play Major League Soccer.
abstract: Ukrainian soccer striker Andriy Shevchenko, national team's leading scorer and an icon to millions of people in his native Ukraine, hopes to move to the United States to play Major League Soccer after the European Championships.
lead_paragraph: After Euro 2012, which begins on Friday, Andriy Shevchenko, 35, an icon to millions of people in his native Ukraine, hopes to move to the United States to play Major League Soccer.

headline.seo: Ukraine Striker Andriy Shevchenko Sees His Final Major Event as a Beginning
headline.main: For Ukraine Striker, Ending Is Also a Beginning
headline.print_headline: A Star Ukraine Striker Plans to Close One Chapter and Start a New One
